homepage.description: We help small businesses collect payments easily through mobile money, cards, and bank transfers.

steps.step3: Share payment link with your customers
steps.step4: Get paid and track everything in one place

feature1.title: Payment Links & QR Codes
feature1.description: Easily generate and share payment links or QR codes with your customers, fast and secure

feature2.title: Customer Management Tools
feature2.description: Keep a record of repeat customers, view their payment history, and simplify follow-ups.

feature3.title: Secure & Compliant
feature3.description: Bank-level encryption, local compliance, and data protection to ensure safe transactions every time.

feature4.title: Merchant page
feature4.description: Create a professional payment page that showcases your business, builds trust with customers.

built_for_every_type_of_transaction.title: Built for Every Type of Transaction

b2b.title: Business-to-Business
b2b.description: Streamlined payment flows for suppliers and vendors.

b2c.title: Business-to-Consumer
b2c.description: Businesses distributing payments to individual customers.

c2b.title: Consumer-to-Business
c2b.description: Ideal for customers paying for products or services.

c2a.title: Consumer-to-Administration
c2a.description: Ideal for payments to entities like schools.

b2g.title: Business-to-Government
b2g.description: For businesses handling permits, or official service contracts.

testimonials_list.content: I love how simple it was to set up. No tech skills needed — just a few clicks and I was ready to accept payments from my clients.
testimonials_list.name: Fatima L

testimonials_list.content: I used to lose customers because I couldn't offer mobile payments. With Easypay Moz, it's now effortless and professional — I get paid faster than ever.
testimonials_list.name: Carlos M.

testimonials_list.content: Easypay Moz made it super easy for me to grow my business and accept payments from anywhere
testimonials_list.name: Maria C

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: For more information, please visit the Help Center.Find all faq's on our faq's page

question1.question: How do I start accepting payments?
question1.answer: Simply sign up for an account, and you can start creating payment links immediately.

question2.question: Can I receive payments via M-Pesa or mobile money?
question2.answer: We support mobile money, cards, and bank transfers.

question3.question: Do I need a registered business to use Easypay Moz?
question3.answer: Yes, we charge a small transaction fee for each payment processed.

question4.question: What fees should I expect per transaction?
question4.answer: You can receive payments directly to your bank account or mobile money wallet.

payment_action.title: Your payment is just a click away
payment_action.description: Start your journey of online payments

kyc.title: KYC Verification
kyc.description: We're required to verify your identity to keep your account secure.
kyc.success_message: Your KYC documents have been submitted successfully. We will notify you once the verification is complete.
kyc.pending_message: Your KYC documents are under review. You will be notified once the verification is complete.
kyc.error_message: There was an error submitting your KYC documents. Please try again later.

kyb.title: KYB Verification
kyb.description: To comply with regulatory requirements we need to confirm your business identity.
kyb.success_message: Your KYB documents have been submitted successfully. We will notify you once the verification is complete.
kyb.pending_message: Your KYB documents are under review. You will be notified once the verification is complete.
kyb.error_message: There was an error submitting your KYB documents. Please try again

account_linking.title: Account Linking
account_linking.description: To receive payouts from your customers, we need to know where to send the funds.
account_linking.success_message: Your account has been linked successfully.
account_linking.pending_message: Your account linking request is under review. You will be notified once it is approved.
account_linking.error_message: There was an error linking your account. Please try again later.

kyb_start.title: Let's get your business verified
kyb_start.description: To activate your account for full functionality, we'll need a few official details about your business. It will be quick.

kyc_start.title: Let's get you verified
kyc_start.description: To keep your account secure and compliant, we'll guide you through a short verification process.
kyc_start.valid_id: A valid ID (e.g., National ID, Passport)
kyc_start.camera_selfie: A camera for a quick selfie

id_guide.title: Capture your ID/Passport
instructions: Accepted documents: National ID (front and back) or Passport
Use a well-lit space – Natural light is best.
Place your ID on a flat surface
Make sure all corners are visible – No cropping!
Take a clear photo – No glare, blur, or shadow.

signup_fail.description: We couldn't create your account. Please try again later or contact support if the issue continues.

otp.title: Two Step Verification
otp.description: Enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone/email to continue.

method_selection.title: Two Step Verification
method_selection.description: Choose how you'd like to verify your profile

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: We'll send a verification code via text

google.title: Google
google.description: Use the code from the authenticator app to verify

instructions: Hold your phone steady and face the camera
Look straight ahead and follow the on-screen instructions

steps: You'll receive an email notification once verification is complete
